climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: ENJOY the deep woodsy, earthy aroma of Patchouli.
TREAT YOUR SKIN & SENSES - Deep and decadent Patchouli essential oil infused with all natural skin nourishing ingredients like olive oil, coconut oil and shea butter!

COMBATS NASTIES - Patchouli has been tested and shown to have powerful natural anti you-know-what... properties (we can't mention the word starting with bac... referring to microscopic organisms that cause problems as Amazon has started auto deleting any listing that does).
NATURAL & SAFE INGREDIENTS - GMO-Free and absolutely NO parabens or SLS.
Handmade in USA with top quality, natural and organic ingredients.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Restores Your Skin Patchouli Essential Oil has been shown to increase collagen production and reduce wrinkle formation from exposure to UV. Cleanses & Moisturizes Skin Crafted for your delicate skin, this handmade bar has wonderful ingredients such as olive oil, coconut oil & shea butter that thoroughly cleanse and moisturize skin. Fights Nasties, Naturally Patchouli oil has been proven to effectively fight nasties.

Natural Skincare When you buy from The Soap Haven, you can be sure you're getting quality products with premium ingredients that are free from SLS, parabens and other nasties! Non-GMO Ingredients Every Patchouli soap bar is made without any genetically modified (GMO) ingredients. SLS & Paraben Free You will never find any Parabens, SLS, or SLES in The Soap Haven products. Handmade in USA Our Patchouli soap bars are handmade in small batches in the USA. Natural Skincare Non-GMO Ingredients SLS & Paraben Free Handmade in USA

Bamboo Charcoal Soap Saver Bags Tea Tree Oil Soap Bars Activated Charcoal Soap Bars Himalayan Salt Soap Bars Goat Milk & Honey Soap Bars Oatmeal & Honey Goat Milk Soap Bars Benefits Soap saver pouches with clever features: Stretches to fit even large bars. Wrist rope prevents dropping slippery soap and can be used for hanging, or use the suction cup to stick onto a smooth surface. Bamboo charcoal infused mesh inhibits nasties. Tea Tree face and body wash for acne, jock itch, body odor; with moisturizing shea butter. Detoxes and deep cleans pores, removing blackheads and impurities to reduce blemishes. Himalayan Salt Soap Bars are helpful for eczema, acne, dry, sensitive & mature skin, yet gentle for daily use for any skin type. Relieves stress, itch, irritation; Deep cleans and exfoliates; Hydrates and moisturizes. Our signature unscented Goat Milk & Honey soap, without oats. Gentle goodness that cleanses, moisturizes, and soothes to help skin conditions such as eczema. Our signature unscented Goat Milk & Honey soap, with the added goodness of oatmeal to cleanse, gently exfoliate, soothe, calm, moisturize and nourish skin. Helpful for eczema, rosacea, itch and rash. Key Ingredients Bamboo Charcoal Tea Tree Oil, Shea Butter Activated Charcoal Himalayan Salt, Sea Salt, Shea Butter Goat Milk, Raw Honey Goat Milk, Gluten-free Oats, Raw Honey For All Skin Types ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

About The Soap Haven USA The Soap Haven USA is a safe haven for handmade soap and skincare that’s made in the USA from premium natural, non-GMO ingredients. Our journey started as a mission to help our own family and friends who suffered from skin issues, such as eczema and extremely dry, flaky and scaly skin that looked like a cracked river bed. Extensive research led us to discover the best natural ingredients that have helped promote healthy, rejuvenated skin for centuries. We put these together and tested them on ourselves. The results were amazing, and we have not looked back since! Our philosophy is simple – we only provide you with products that we ourselves use. We never sell anything that we would not use on ourselves and our kids. We are committed to using premium, natural, organic, and non-GMO ingredients. For example, we use non-GMO plant oils as a soap base, and our goat milk soap is made with fresh goat’s milk, sourced locally from specific breeds for their high fatty acid and nutritional levels. And we insist on absolutely NO sulfates, parabens, or questionable synthetic chemicals… ever. Try our natural handmade soap for yourself and experience the difference. Then share the goodness with your family and friends!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This soap is great!! It's hard to find a good patchouli soap that doesn't cost an arm and a leg. This soap is very reasonably priced, the scent is earthy and strong, and the bars are quite large. I will definitely be a return buyer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Patchouli Heaven with Soap Haven
reviews.reviewText: If there’s one thing that I’d like you to remember after reading this review, it’s this: You will see many companies use the label “all-natural soap,” but few are TRULY all-natural. To me, this means the following:• No additives.• No hidden fragrances.• No micas.• No colorants.• No preservatives.• No chemicals.Therefore, be kind to yourself and read the ingredients before you buy a soap, and make sure that it meets YOUR definition of all-natural.I investigated Soap Haven and its products extensively, and rest assured: Soap Haven’s soaps are truly ALL-NATURAL. Here are the ingredients of the Patchouli soap: Saponified Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Organic Palm Oil, Shea Butter, Patchouli Essential Oil, Kaolin Clay, and Iron Oxide. You will note that these ingredients don’t include any of the undesirable ingredients that I listed above. Just pure goodness!Here are some of the benefits of patchouli:• Reducing inflammation• Healing cracked, dry skin• Helping with common skin problems (e.g., acne, eczema)• Calming and centering the nervesIf you’ve never heard of Patchouli, let me warn you that people either LOVE or HATE the smell. Obviously, I liked it, or I wouldn’t be recommending it! However, beware that people have very strong reactions to this scent: they either fall in love with it, or they never want to have anything to do with it ever again! Those that like it describe it as follows: earthy, musky, sweet, spicy, and woodsy. The best way to describe it is to imagine walking through the woods in the fall after a good rain; the smell of the air in the woods is somewhat akin to patchouli. On the other hand, those that hate it describe it as a dank, damp, rotten smell. I find it most amusing that people can have such opposite reactions to the same smell! Read the reviews on Amazon, and you’ll see what I mean!Of the Patchouli soaps that I’ve tried, this is the purest one. The scent of patchouli is strong and hasn’t been watered down by combining it with other flavors.Soap Haven produces soap with heart, and they are one of the few companies that are truly and honestly 100% ALL-NATURAL, so go ahead and try all their flavors with confidence!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Large, hefty bars. A good value for the price.
reviews.reviewText: These bars are huge. They look like bricks. Having said that, they are a bit weak in the fragrance factor. Oh they smell good, and they make an abundant lather, but the bars themselves could have a bit more patchouli oil in their mix. Overall, good soap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This soap is exactly the smell I have been looking for; the Patchouli soap is fantastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Smell is Transformative!
reviews.reviewText: Excellent product. That great smell lasts the entire bar and is so calming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I DIDN’T EXPECT TO LOVE THIS SOAP SO MUCH!
reviews.reviewText: This soap smells and feels so good that it makes me look forward to showering even more than I did. It has such a pleasant fragrance that the whole bathroom smells good after a shower. Love it and never want to be without it! We always used a much cheaper brand that we bought by the case. It turns out this one is way worth spending more on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's a quality soap no doubt. But it's so strong my wife made me give it to my son and toss the bar I had away after having it for over month. Super strong. Smell never goes away.Anyone saying this weak needs to see an ent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is real Patchouli
reviews.reviewText: I love this soap ive been getting soap that was expensive and i saw this soap.First of all i LOVE patchouli i just love the scent since my hippie days a long time ago we burned patchouli incense and this soap has the true smell no fake smells here it lathers up nice and leaves a scent on you which i love.I will be subscribing for more great soap great smell nice price cant go wrong.
